inputFile.description: Input SQL file. Converter uses this data as a source

outputFile.description: Result output file. Converter writes data into this file

handlers.description: Every handler applies to every suitable input file line and generates output file line

type.description: Handler type. Determine which handler should run (`regex-generator` or `template`)

name.description: Handler name. Uses to show progress while converting and to improve readability during converter config editing

filter.description: Optional regex to identify which input file lines should be handled. Uses to skip some lines which fit the `pattern` regex

pattern.description: Regex pattern to extract fields from input file line. Required for `regex-generator` handler type. Uses filtered input file lines and extracts regex groups for `substitution`. Useful to define named regex groups like `(?<id>\d+)` and `(?<name>'.*?')`
examples: INSERT INTO GAME \(ID, INFO_LINK, NAME\) VALUES \((?<id>\d+), (?<infoLink>'.*?'), (?<name>'.*?')\);

substitution.description: Regex substitution expression to generate result file line. Required for `regex-generator` handler type. `pattern` regex groups are available here. For example, ${id}, ${name}
examples: MERGE INTO GAME (SOURCE_TYPE, SOURCE_ID, INFO_LINK, NAME) KEY (SOURCE_TYPE, SOURCE_ID) VALUES ('IGDB', '${id}', ${infoLink}, ${name});

template.description: Mustache template. Required for `template` handler type.

handlers.name: platform sql
handlers.pattern: INSERT INTO PLATFORM \(ID, ACTIVE, NAME, SHORT_NAME\) VALUES \((?<id>\d+), TRUE, (?<name>'.*?'), (?<shortName>'.*?')\);
handlers.substitution: MERGE INTO PLATFORM (SOURCE_TYPE, SOURCE_ID, NAME, SHORT_NAME) KEY (SOURCE_TYPE, SOURCE_ID) VALUES ('IGDB', ${id}, ${name}, ${shortName});

handlers.name: game sql
handlers.pattern: INSERT INTO GAME \(ID, INFO_LINK, NAME\) VALUES \((?<id>\d+), (?<infoLink>'.*?'), (?<name>'.*?')\);
handlers.substitution: MERGE INTO GAME (SOURCE_TYPE, SOURCE_ID, INFO_LINK, NAME) KEY (SOURCE_TYPE, SOURCE_ID) VALUES ('IGDB', '${id}', ${infoLink}, ${name});

handlers.name: game_platform sql
handlers.pattern: INSERT INTO GAME_PLATFORM \(ID, GAME_ID, PLATFORM_ID\) VALUES \(\d+, (?<gameId>.*?), (?<platformId>.*?)\);
handlers.substitution: MERGE INTO GAME_PLATFORM (SOURCE_TYPE, GAME_ID, PLATFORM_ID) KEY (GAME_ID, PLATFORM_ID) VALUES ('IGDB', (SELECT ID FROM game WHERE SOURCE_TYPE='IGDB' AND SOURCE_ID='${gameId}'), (SELECT ID FROM platform WHERE SOURCE_TYPE='IGDB' AND SOURCE_ID='${platformId}'));
